comment.text: This translation key is used to display the label "Mark as favorite" in the UI, likely as a button or option. It should be translated in the context of a user interface where users can mark items as their favorites.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'Favorit kimi işarələ' is not the most natural or accurate rendering of 'Mark as favorite' in Azerbaijani. While it's understandable, it's a somewhat literal and clunky translation.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Sevimli kimi etiqna / Sevimlilər siyahısına əlavə et

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The verb form 'işarələ' appears to be an attempt at a verbal noun or participle but isn't grammatically correct in standard Azerbaijani. It needs to be conjugated appropriately to fit the sentence's intended meaning.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Requires more careful consideration of the intended verb form.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While technically correct, "Marquer en tant que favori" is a bit formal and not the most natural way to say "Mark as favorite." A more common and idiomatic translation would be something like "Ajouter aux favoris" or "Enregistrer comme favori".
While "Նշել որպես ընտրյալ" is understandable, a more natural and idiomatic translation of "Mark as favorite" in Armenian would be something along the lines of "Ավելացնել շնորհակներին" or "Հավանել"
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider "Ավելացնել շնորհակներին" or "Հավանել" as alternative translations.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While 'お気に入りに登録' is a common way to express 'Mark as favorite', a more direct and perhaps more natural translation in this context would be 'お気に入りに追加' (Okinari ni teisuu).  '登録' implies a registration process, which isn't necessarily what's intended when marking something as a favorite in a UI element.
The Lao translation "ຫມາຍດາວເອກະສານ" literally translates to 'Mark star document.' While conveying a similar meaning, it's not a natural or idiomatic translation of 'Mark as favorite.'
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: ຫມາຍເປັນສຸດທະຍາຄິດ (May pen sutthayakhit) - This translates to 'Mark as preferred' or 'Mark as top choice' and is a more natural way to express 'Mark as favorite' in Lao. Alternatively, ຫມາຍເປັນສຸດທະຍາ (May pen sutthaya) could also work.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation "Добавить в избранное" while conveying a similar meaning, doesn't directly translate to "Mark as favorite". A more literal translation might be "Отметить как избранное" or "Добавить в любимые". "Добавить в избранное" implies adding to a pre-existing favorites list, whereas "Mark as favorite" might simply indicate setting a favorite.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider "Отметить как избранное" or "Добавить в любимые" for a more direct translation.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'ප්‍රියතම ලෙස යොදන්න' while attempting to convey 'Mark as favorite', is a bit too literal and not the most natural phrasing in Sinhala. A more idiomatic translation would be something like 'ප්‍රියතමයා ලෙස සලකන්න' or 'ප්‍රියතම ලකුණක් ලෙසින්'.

While 'Означи као омиљено' is understandable, a more natural and common translation for 'Mark as favorite' in Serbian (Cyrillic) would be 'Забележи као омиљено' or 'Додај у омиљене'.  'Означи' implies a more general marking, not specifically a favorite.
